content.title: National Beekeeping & Honey Mission
content.department: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
content.beneficiary: Beekeeper, Entrepreneurs, Farmers, Honey FPO, Start Up
content.details: The main objectives of the scheme are to promote holistic growth of the beekeeping industry for income and employment generation, providing livelihood support to farm and non-farm households, and to enhance agriculture/horticulture production. It includes developing infrastructure for quality honeybee stock, setting up diagnostic labs, and promoting agri-entrepreneurs.
benefits: Enhances yields & quality of produce of various crops through pollination support
Helps in sustainable development of Agriculture and Environment
Increases income of beekeepers/farmers through production of honey & other beehive products
Serves as a source of livelihood
Helps in prosperity of farmers, healthy people and strong Nation
Adopt Scientific Beekeeping for own and Nation’s prosperity
eligibility: Anyone can apply for the scheme
Individuals, farmers, self-help groups, cooperatives, FPOs, Start Ups and entrepreneurs engaged in scientific beekeeping and honey production are eligible
content.application_process: Offline. Applicants must register on the Madhukranti Portal and submit a detailed project report as per guidelines.

faqs.question: What are the primary benefits of participating in the National Beekeeping & Honey Mission (NBHM)?
faqs.answer: The NBHM offers several benefits, including financial support, technical training, access to modern beekeeping techniques, and market linkages for beekeepers and honey producers.

faqs.question: What is the National Beekeeping & Honey Mission (NBHM)?
faqs.answer: The National Beekeeping & Honey Mission is a government initiative aimed at promoting and developing beekeeping and honey production in India.

faqs.question: Are there financial incentives available through the NBHM?
faqs.answer: Yes, the NBHM often provides financial incentives such as subsidies to support beekeepers.

faqs.question: What types of training and capacity-building benefits does the NBHM offer?
faqs.answer: The NBHM conducts various training programs and workshops to enhance the skills and knowledge of beekeepers.

faqs.question: Does the NBHM provide market linkages for honey producers?
faqs.answer: Yes, the NBHM facilitates market linkages by connecting honey producers with buyers, processors, and exporters.

faqs.question: Is there any incentive for women interested in beekeeping?
faqs.answer: Yes, assistance is provided for the formation of women groups and working capital to sustain the activity.

faqs.question: Is there an age limit for participation in the National Beekeeping & Honey Mission?
faqs.answer: There is typically no specific age limit for individuals interested in beekeeping.

faqs.question: Are there any educational qualifications required to join the mission?
faqs.answer: Generally, there are no specific educational qualifications required.
